name: Tipster
body: ### Basic iOS Tip Calculator This is a basic Tip Calculator application that is designed to introduce iOS to new developers. It illustrates some of the basics of Interface Builder, view controllers, and delegates. ### User Stories This simple Tip Calculator application supports the following user stories: - A user may enter a bill amount - A user may dismiss the keyboard - A user may change the tip percentage ### Screenshots
